name: Goalie Challenge VR
description:
Feel the thrill of being a goalie - catch, stop and block slap shots in this fun VR hockey goalie game.

  • Built by a hockey goalie for other goalies that are either too far away from ice or can't get enough of the action.
  • Fully immersive with surround sound and haptic vibration for realistic gameplay.
  • Multiple levels of difficulty, lefties and righties welcome.
  • Play against friends with local shooter mode.
  • HTC Vive and Oculus compatible.
  • FREE TO PLAY!
